name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mailist - Bookmark Manager and Read Later Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to summarize and save any page to your Mailist and turn your unreads into personalied email newsletter!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mailist is a powerful yet simple bookmarking tool that allows you to save articles for later and sends you a weekly reminder of unread links from your list. Unlike other bookmarking tools, Mailist includes a unique follow-up mechanism that helps you stay engaged with your saved content by delivering random unread articles straight to your inbox.

Adding links is easyâ€”just enter URLs manually or use the browser extension. You can even import bookmarks from other services like Pocket or Twitter! Plus, Mailist is free to use!
